title: Virgin Islands National Park: Places
body: Places       A Glimpse of St. John's Plantation Era.  This virtual tour of windmills & plantations provides you with a snapshot of the plantations of St. John.  Best viewed using the full screen option below the map.      View full screen.        Annaberg CyArk Project: Annaberg Sugar Plantation and it's role in the Trans-Atlantic Slave Trade. Other Information History of Annaberg by David Knight (pdf 12mb) Annaberg Plantation Walking Tour (pdf 1.3mb) Annaberg Technical Drawings HABS (pdf 4.4mb) Annaberg Photographs HABS (pdf 2.5mb)   Annaberg Text HABS (pdf 147kb)          Creque Marine Railway Postcard   Hassel Island Creque Marine Railway Technical Drawings pdf 1.4mb Creque Marine Railway Photos from HABS pdf 5mb   Creque Marine Railway History HABS pdf 934kb
